# Land Development Services

__

#### Land Development Services Alert:

CONTACT INFORMATION:  Monday through Thursday, 8 a.m. - 4 p.m. and Friday, 9:15 a.m. - 4 p.m. Please note that visitors may not be added to in-person queues past 3:45 p.m. 

__

703-222-0801 TTY 711

__

LandDevelopmentServices@fairfaxcounty.gov

__

12055 Government Center Pkwy  
Fairfax, VA 22035

__

fairfaxcounty

__

Bill Hicks  
Director

# Building Code and Construction Type History

Prior to the creation and adoption of the Uniform Statewide Building Code (USBC), many old building records and plans reference construction type classifications as shown in legacy building code books such as the Building Officials and Code Administrators (BOCA). This construction type history chart shows the progression of how buildings were classified throughout the evolution of the building codes. The chart helps to correlate those old construction type classification references to those used currently in our newly adopted building codes.

## Evolution of Construction Types

Code Name | Editions | NC*  
Protected | NC*  
Protected | NC*  
Protected | NC*  
Protected | NC*  
Unprotected | NC/C*  
Protected | NC/C*  
Unprotected | NC/C*  
Heavy Timber | Combustible  
Protected | Combustible  
Unprotected  
---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---  
ICC International Building Code | 2000 - Present | IA | IA | IB | IIA | IIB | IIIA | IIIB | IV | VA | VB  
BOCA National Building Code | 1984 - 1996 | 1A | 1B | 2A | 2B | 2C | 3A | 3B | 4 | 5A | 5B  
BOCA Basic Building Code | 1960 - 1981 | 1A | 1B | 2A | 2B | 2C | 3B | 3C | 3A | 4A | 5B  
  
* NC = Noncombustible  
** C = Combustible

---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---

Need Help? Call **703-222-0801** , **TTY 711**.

Monday through Thursday from 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. and Friday from 9:15 a.m. to 4 p.m.

  * LDS Permit Library: Access guides to navigate every record type in PLUS.
  * Letters to Industry: Subscribe for LDS announcements, notices, and tech bulletins.
  * Meet With Staff: Find a staff member to help you with the permit process.
